ygData.subject: Re: Description Thingy
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I have also seen it playing with options or something like that, but I really havent wanted to enter a descrition, as I dont look cool enough for someone
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I have also seen it playing with options or something like that, but I
really havent wanted to enter a descrition, as I dont look cool enough for
someone to check me out.
